name: Create a Salesforce lead from a new row in a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet
description:
Every time a new row with contact details is added to a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet, Make will automatically check if the contact exists in Salesforce as contact or a lead and if it doesn't, it will create a Salesforce lead.

Your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet has to contain headers. The template uses [this worksheet](https://1drv.ms/x/s!AjJKBs6vWrtygQQyJCh-IQojKOgM?e=uOvp9I).
